data.name: Avado
data.description:
Polkadot node deployment with consumer hardware, AVADO wants to make using Web3 applications like personal finance - identity - social apps - blockchain nodes and staking easy for users. It comes pre-installed with the AVADO OS. Users can connect to it through a WiFi hotspot and it has a Web-based UI that allows users to manage and monitor the device. AVADO claims to be convenient, secure and true to the spirit of decentralisation.

The AVADO RYO (Run Your Own) Cloud is a secure way to share AVADO resources with others. Through the RYO Cloud users can share their relayers, their ETH, BTC or IPFS node. Sharing resources through the AVADO RYO Cloud can be rewarded through trustless Smart Contract based incentives, a true innovation on the blockchain.

In the Web-UI of AVADO, users will find the DappStore that hosts a curated list of software that they can install to extend the functionalities of your AVADO. AVADO constantly add more and update these packages. A customised onboarding wizard for each package makes setting it up a breeze.
